SEARCH
Package spaceInvaders.Controller

Interface IGameController

All Known Implementing Classes:
GameController
public interface IGameController
Interface defining the contract for the GameController in the Space Invaders game. It includes methods for handling player and enemy movements, shooting actions, game state management, and other game-related functionalities.
Version:
1.0
Author:
MD Amanullah

  • Method Details

    • movePlayer

      void movePlayer(int dx, int dy)
      Moves the player in the specified direction.
      Parameters:
      dx - Change in x-axis (-1 left, 1 right, 0 stationary).
      dy - Change in y-axis (-1 up, 1 down, 0 stationary).

    • shootBullet

      void shootBullet()
      Triggers the player to shoot a bullet.

    • moveEnemy

      void moveEnemy(int dx, int dy)
      Moves the enemy in the specified direction.
      Parameters:
      dx - Change in x-axis (-1 left, 1 right, 0 stationary).
      dy - Change in y-axis (-1 up, 1 down, 0 stationary).

    • shootEnemyBullet

      void shootEnemyBullet()
      Triggers the enemy to shoot a bullet.

    • setGameState

      void setGameState(GameState state)
      Sets the game state to a specified value.
      Parameters:
      state - New state of the game.

    • getPlayerX

      int getPlayerX()
      Retrieves the x-coordinate of the player.
      Returns:
      The x-coordinate of the player.

    • getPlayerY

      int getPlayerY()
      Retrieves the y-coordinate of the player.
      Returns:
      The y-coordinate of the player.

    • getBulletCount

      int getBulletCount()
      Gets the count of bullets currently in play.
      Returns:
      Number of bullets.

    • getBulletPosition

      int[] getBulletPosition(int index)
      Retrieves the position of a specific bullet based on its index.
      Parameters:
      index - Index of the bullet in the collection.
      Returns:
      The x and y coordinates of the bullet, or null if index is invalid.

    • getLifeCount

      int getLifeCount()
      Retrieves the count of remaining lives for the player.
      Returns:
      Number of remaining lives.

    • updateGame

      void updateGame()
      Updates the game state and view.

    • isStarExists

      boolean isStarExists()
      Checks if a star exists in the game.
      Returns:
      True if a star exists, false otherwise.

    • getStarPosition

      int[] getStarPosition()
      Retrieves the position of the star if it exists.
      Returns:
      The x and y coordinates of the star, or null if no star exists.

    • getScore

      int getScore()
      Retrieves the current score of the player.
      Returns:
      Player's score.

    • isGameOver

      boolean isGameOver()
      Checks if the game is over.
      Returns:
      True if the game is over, false otherwise.

      Returns:
      Number of enemy bullets.

    • getEnemyBulletPosition

      int[] getEnemyBulletPosition(int index)
      Retrieves the position of a specific enemy bullet based on its index.
      Parameters:
      index - Index of the enemy bullet in the collection.
      Returns:
      The x and y coordinates of the enemy bullet, or null if index is invalid.

      Retrieves the current score of the enemy.
      Returns:

      Handles key press events to control game functionality.

      keyCode - The keycode of the key pressed.

    • isGameRunning

      boolean isGameRunning()
      Checks if the game is currently running.
      Returns:
